turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call for days, but the line is always busy! It's so frustrating.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can definitely help you with that. Could you please provide me with your full name and date of birth so I can locate your record?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Jane Doe, and my birthday is January 1st, 1980.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. I see your record. Dr. Ramirez has availability on Tuesday the 15th at 10:00 AM, or Thursday the 17th at 2:30 PM. Would either of those times work for you? I think I also see a slot on the 16th at 9:00AM.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, the 15th at 10:00 AM works. Quick question - is that a telehealth appointment or in-person? I'd really prefer in-person if possible, given it's been a while since I've seen her.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check on that for you... Okay, the 15th at 10:00 AM is currently scheduled as a telehealth appointment. I can change it to in-person, but the earliest in-person slot isn't available until the 22nd at 11:00 AM. Does that work, or would you prefer to keep the telehealth appointment on the 15th?
